item.title: Fly Tipping in Parish Gate Drive carpark, 31st January
item.description:
Someone has dumped a load of rubbish in a large white nylon building sack in Parish Gate Drive carpark (next to the park) this morning. Unfortunately I did not get the number plate but will check with our neighbours who live opposite the park if they saw anything. Could it please be removed. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Gate Drive, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned van, 31st January
item.description:
There is an abandoned van at the end of Curran Avenue - registration GL56 AWP. It has been here since May 2025 and has not been moved for 8 months. It has a flat tyre and is clearly dumped. A note was put on the window of the van about a month ago and the note has not been moved which also indicates this van is abandoned. It is taking up about 2 of the limited parking spaces on the road and as a resident of Curran Avenue who has a 8 month old baby, this is very frustrating when having to park roads away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, Blackfen Road, Blackfen, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gulleys on Deptford Green, 31st January
item.description:
The two gulleys either side of the raised table outside Hughes House on Deptford Green are blocked. Please can these be cleared.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benbow Street, Deptford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 21 Waites Court, 31st January
item.description:
This road is signed clearly to both left and right with a no entry sign ⛔️ and yet it has now illegally being used by vehicles as a thoroughfare! It is making our road both noisy and congested with people hooting their horns and getting road rage! You have yet t answer my previous report and my photos clearly show vehicles breaking the law constantly! Why both signing it no entry ⛔️ and yet people ignore it? This is simply unacceptable and must be dealt with immediately. I live in this road precisely because it is both quiet and leafy and this has drastically changed because countless drivers are ignoring the no entry ⛔️ sign!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73-79, Priory Road, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gully near Gilbert House, 31st January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benbow Street, Deptford
